description: Three bacon egg muffins on a white plate with a silver fork

content: "Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Generously grease a muffin tin with butter, ensuring they don’t stick. Whisk together eggs, milk, bacon, green onions, cheese, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper."

description: A muffin tin that has been greased with butter

content: "Pour the egg mixture into each cavity, filling 3/4 full. Sprinkle with the remaining cheddar cheese. Bake for 15-20 minutes until set. They will puff up as they cook and deflate as they cool."

description: Egg mixture in the muffin tin before being baked

content: "Cool for 2-3 minutes in the pan, then serve immediately! Perfect for a delicious, flavor-packed breakfast or snack!"
